name: 阿维·安其
birth_place: 美国，亚利桑那州，菲尼克斯，天堂谷
introduction: A Tripple threat from Paradise Valley, Arizona. Avi has accomplished a lot already, from a national sold out tour performing on stage with his brother, Asher Angel (Shazam! / Andi Mack), to working with the likes of Jessica Chastain, Nickelodeon and the Disney Channel. He recently signed a record deal with Sony Music through the Jam Jr platform and amassed a million streams in the first week. His social media accounts are very active with his followers with a 90% engagement rate. Passionate and dedicated to his craft, Avi Angel is here to stay.
